text:
Presidents' Day is bringing a ton of awesome sales to your fingertips. The event may not be as huge for shopping as the likes of Black Friday or Cyber Monday, but it still boasts savings in a range of different markets — including mattresses and tech.

Of course, there are a ton of offers out there, and they can all be a bit overwhelming. That’s why we’ve put together this guide — so that you don’t have to do the research yourself. Here are some of the best Presidents' Day sales out there.

Fashion

Nordstrom: The department store's highly-anticipated Winter Sale — up to 40% off — coincides with Presidents' Day and continues through Feb 25.

Saks Off 5th: Extra 25% off clearance apparel with code PRESWKND. The offer is available for select styles, and runs through Feb 19.

Barney's Warehouse: Save up to 70% off when you take up to an extra 40% off select designer styles.

Macy's: Extra 10%, 15%, or 20% off with code PRES.

Banana Republic: 40% off your order (some exclusions apply).

American Eagle Outfitters: 60% off of clearance items.

Furniture

Need to freshen up the look at your pad? There are plenty of furniture deals for you to explore.

Wayfair: Up to 65% off of bedroom and patio furniture, and up to 70% off kitchen, dining, and storage. Wayfair's sale — running through Feb 21 — extends just about every category in their inventory.

Joss and Main: Take an extra 20% off select items with code SCORE. Rugs, furniture, and lighting are already discounted up to 75% off. Discounts are available for other categories as well.

Birch Lane: Extra 15% off select items.

Crate & Barrel: Up to 20% off media storage. (valid through 2/19)

Target: Up to 30% off home items + 15% off rugs, indoor and outdoor furniture.

Mattresses

Looking to get a new mattress? There are a ton of mattress deals out there for Presidents Day, and we’ve gone through them all. In case you don’t want to trawl through all those deals, we’ve put together some of the best ones below.

Nectar: Use promo code FINDS125 to get $125 off your mattress purchase plus two free pillows. Nectar offers customers 365 night home trial, forever warranty and free shipping and returns. Their mattresses work with all bed frames.

Nolah: Use code PRESIDENT to get $125 off. Nolah's mattresses are 100% temperature neutral foam promising customers will sleep cooler than any memory foam mattress.

Helix: $100 off any mattress with the code SNOOZE100, or $150 off any mattress when bought with another product, using the code PDW150.

PlushBeds: $1,200 off of its latex mattresses plus two free Organic Latex Pillows, a Plush Luxury Sheet Set, and a mattress protector. If a latex mattress isn’t your thing, the company is also offering $600 off of its memory foam mattresses, plus you’ll also get two pillows, a Plush Luxury Sheet Set, and a Cool Gel Pad. Other deals include $100 off of all sofa bed mattresses, and $100 off all toppers. PlushBeds has also been kind enough to offer you an exclusive deal -- get an extra $50 off your order with the code FORBES50.

Brooklyn Bedding: $150 off the Brooklyn Signature mattress, $300 off the Brooklyn Aurora mattress, and $50 off the Brooklyn Bowery mattress.

Tech

Last but certainly not least is tech, and while generally tech deals are reserved for other events, some companies are still offering some pretty sweet deals on Presidents Day.

Ebay: eBay deals page has new Presidents Day deals that will show up each day, many of them offering over 90% off of some items. Use code PRESDAY for 20% off select tech, home and other items.

Amazon: 20% off select items in electronics, fashion, and more.

Best Buy: Discounts on TVs, laptops and tablets with up to 35% off appliances.
